kerala.title: Kerala
kerala.subtitle: God's own country
kerala.description: A popular tourist destination, Kerala woos you with its crystal-clear lagoons, pristine beaches, misty hills and sprawling wildlife sanctuaries. The exotic culture and local cuisine further adds up to its charm.

srinagar.title: Srinagar , Jammu and Kashmir
srinagar.subtitle: Pradise on the banks of Jhelum
srinagar.description: Jahangir's 'heaven on earth', Srinagar offers the picturesque Dal Lake, breath-taking mountain views, stunning Mughal gardens and sprawling orchards.

chikmangalur.title: Chikmagalur , Karnataka
chikmangalur.subtitle: Lush Green Hill Station in Karnataka
chikmangalur.description: A hill station at the foothills of the Mullayanagiri peak in the Western Ghats in Karnataka, Chikmagalur entices with trekking trails, coffee plantations, rivers, waterfalls, temples and wildlife.

rishikesh.title: Rishikesh , Uttarakhand
rishikesh.subtitle: Adventure Hub of Uttarakhand
rishikesh.description: Known as the 'Yoga Capital of the World', Rishikesh is aserene Himalayan town nestled on the banks of River Ganges. It is famous for its ancient temples, hippiecafes  and dare-devil adventure sports.

jaipur.title: Jaipur , Rajasthan
jaipur.subtitle: The capital and the largest city of Rajasthan
jaipur.description: Fondly known as the ‘Pink City’ and now declared as a UNESCO World Heritage Site, Jaipur’s historic forts, majestic palaces and ancient temples make it a perfect royal getaway in the heart of Aravallis.

jagannath.title: Shree Jagannath Temple
jagannath.subtitle: A Char Dham Site
jagannath.description: Believed to be the divine abode of Lord Vishnu, Lord Balaram and Goddess Subhadra, this legendary 12th century edifice is the primary tourist attraction in Puri.

sethan.title: Sethan Valley
sethan.subtitle: A serene Himalayan village with picturesque landscapes
sethan.description: Sethan Valley is a tranquil village nestled in the Himalayas, near Manali. It offers a peaceful escape from the bustling tourist spots.

himvalley.title: Himvalley Amusement & Cultural Park
himvalley.subtitle: Amusement park with snow mounts
himvalley.description: Himvalley is an amusement park in Manali known for its rides, cultural programmes, food court and is an ideal destination.

goa.title: Baga beach, Goa
goa.subtitle: Hippie beach shacks
goa.description: One of the most popular beaches in Goa, Baga Beach offers quirky beach-side shacks and a number of thrilling water sports.

bk.title: Brahma Kumaris Ashram Mount Abu
bk.subtitle: Revered Spiritual Headquarters
bk.description: Brahma Kumaris Ashram Mount Abu is the headquarters of the spiritual organization founded in the 1930s by Brahma Baba. It is a famous retreat for education and practices.

exploreMore.title: Discover Your Next Adventure
exploreMore.subtitle: Join travel groups and share your experiences

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Welcome to our travel community platform. We aim to connect adventurous souls who wish to explore the world together. Join a group, share your experiences, and find the perfect travel companions for your next trip. With detailed group information, including itineraries and admin contacts, planning your adventure has never been easier.

signing.title: Sign up to travel efficiently
signing.subtitle: Put yourself in the know and receive the most exclusive offers before anyone else
